titles.title: Soledad Canyon Mine Lease Cancellation Act

A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to cancel certain Bureau of Land Management leases that authorize extraction of sand and gravel from the Federal mineral estate in land in Soledad Canyon, California, and for other purposes.
Soledad Canyon Mine Lease Cancellation Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Soledad Canyon Mine Lease Cancellation Act - Instructs the Secretary of the Interior to cancel two specified Bureau of Land Management leases pertaining to the extraction of sand and gravel from the Federal mineral estate in land in Soledad Canyon adjacent to the City of Santa Clarita, California.
Authorizes the Secretary to issue new leases for the extraction of sand and gravel in the Soledad Canyon, California.
